Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 42nd overall pick, by Detroit in 2018...
Injured on 4/24/2018 with a Bruised Jaw, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit on 4/3/2019, off Robert Knox (MON)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/3/2019, off Ryan Loya (PHI)...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/17/2019, hitting .545 with 6 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/2020, hitting .343 with 6 HR, 20 RBI...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/31/2020, hitting .520 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2020, hitting .398 with 6 HR, 18 RBI...
Had 22-game hitting streak snapped on 9/10/2020...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,664,286 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,664,286 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2024: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,664,286 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/24/2024, hitting .409 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
10/20/2024: Signed a contract extension with Detroit, $11,000,000 per year, for 5 years.
Was selected to the 2025 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/4/2026, hitting .385 with 2 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/11/2027, hitting .400 with 2 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/26/2028, hitting .391 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/7/2028, hitting .333 with 5 HR, 14 RBI...
Injured on 8/7/2028 with a Inflamed Achilles Tendon, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/4/2030 to a 2-year deal worth $3,120,000 per year...
